title: A hen
content: Ted is a hen. The hen is red. Ted is a red hen.

title: The blue ball
content: This is a ball. The ball is blue. Look at the blue ball. My brother will kick it.

title: This is a book
content: This is a book. These are also books. That is a book. Those are all books. I read those books.

title: Banana
content: I am a banana. I am yellow. I am soft. I am sweet and delicious. I like banana.
